description:
The R-2 Powered is the result of the R-2 having the Plus Parts equipped.
Its shoulders are equipped with two Hi-Zol Launchers, as well as each of its arms having solid shields. Its beam barrier was upgraded into an AB Field. Its firepower and armor were also increased greatly.
During the combination into SRX, the Hi-Zol Launchers become SRX`s arms and hands, while its main body and shields act as the SRX`s main body and chest armor.
name: R-2 Powered
